description:
Tokyo, the big city. In the corner of this world, another day of bittersweet drama is about to unfoldâ€¦ According to Pekola the angel, Yurine the witch hosts a sabbath at a run-down apartment in Jinbocho. There, Jashin-chan the devil prepares a divine hot pot that captivates Yurine, Medusa, Minos and Pekola. But everything starts to fall apart when Jashin-chan brings drama to the dinner table.
Source: Amazon
